imdb.plot outline: Is it the end or a new beginning? In the style of a documentary, Families at the crossroads: Crime relates what happens when the closest, most important and most emotional bonds in our lives are suddenly torn apart - the family bond. Threatened by abuse, betrayal, secrets, illness - all topics viewers can relate to. These stories are taken from true crime events - such as those found in the news and are recreated in a dramatized form.
imdb.title: Families at the Crossroads: Crime
